Title: Google Reveals Two New Web Crawlers
Description: Google has introduced two new web crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video.

Title: EU Demands Microsoft Provide Information on Bing AI Risks
Description: The European Commission has ordered Microsoft to provide information on the risks of generative AI in its Bing search engine, threatening fines if it fails to comply.

Title: Microsoft PC Manager Promotes Bing as Solution for PC Issues
Description: Microsoft's PC Manager app is recommending users set Bing as their default search engine as a way to "repair" their Windows devices, raising concerns about potentially deceptive practices.

Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Rolling Out to Advertisers
Description: Google is reportedly rolling out AI-powered summaries for Google Ads campaigns, providing a concise overview of campaign performance.

Title: Order with Google Integration to End in June
Description: Google's "Order with Google" integration, allowing users to order food directly from search results, will be discontinued at the end of June.

Title: Users Seek Ways to Remove Content from Google AI Overviews
Description: SEOs and users are exploring methods to remove content from Google's AI Overviews, with some reporting success using the "nosnippet" robots meta tag.

Title: Former Bing AI Head Joins Perplexity Advisory Board
Description: Mikhail Parakhin, former head of Bing Search, AI, and Ads at Microsoft, has joined the advisory board of AI search startup Perplexity.

Title: TikTok Tests 60-Minute Video Uploads
Description: TikTok is experimenting with longer video uploads, allowing users to post videos up to 60 minutes in length.

Title: EU Demands Clarity from Microsoft on AI Risks in Bing
Description: The European Commission has given Microsoft a deadline of May 27 to provide information on the risks of generative AI in its search engine, Bing.

Title: Users Can Now Remove Content from Google AI Overviews
Description: Users have found ways to remove their content from Google's AI Overviews using methods like the 'nosnippet' tag.

Title: Two New Googlebots: GoogleOther-Image & GoogleOther-Video
Description: Google has introduced two new web crawlers, GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video, potentially indicating increased focus on crawling and indexing different content types.

Title: Google Locks Down Complaints of Image Thumbnails Not Showing in Search
Description: Google has locked a support thread related to ongoing issues with image thumbnails not appearing in search results, acknowledging the issue but not providing specific solutions.

Title: EU Demands Information From Microsoft on Bing AI Risks
Description: The European Commission has given Microsoft a deadline of May 27th to provide information about the risks associated with generative AI in its Bing search engine, threatening fines for non-compliance.
